archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Maria Letizio Conforto Architectural Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Maria Letizio Conforto Architectural Papers, Ms2002-056, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Maria Letizio Conforto Architectural Papers were donated to Special Collections in 2002.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Maria Letizio Conforto Architectural Papers were added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Maria Letizio Conforto Collection consists of drawings of Museo Nazionale Romano Crypta Balbi, slides, articles, and a brief biographical sketch.
